events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking page shows no updates. Can you help?
The issue reported is categorized under delivery delay due to keywords like 'order', 'tracking', and 'not arrived'.
The case has been assigned to the delivery support team to investigate the delayed shipment issue.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. Let me check the status for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look into the tracking details?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the address is 789 Pine Street, Springfield, IL.
I checked with the courier service and it appears the package was delayed due to weather issues. We expect delivery within three more days.
Three more days is quite disappointing as I needed it earlier, but I appreciate the update. Please keep me posted.
Due to the delay's impact on the customer, this case has been escalated to the senior support team to explore faster solutions.
Senior team confirmed we can expedite shipping via express service at no extra cost. Your package should arrive by tomorrow.
Thank you for the quick response and the expedited shipping offer. I really appreciate the effort to resolve this.
The shipping method has been updated and your order will be delivered tomorrow. We consider this case resolved now.
Just following up to ensure your order has arrived and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
